Package org.protune.core

Package org.protune.core provides the core classes of the Protune system.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Checker The interface Checker provides methods for checking whether a notification is (not) reliable, i.e. whether an action, which is supposed to be executed, was actually executed as reported in its notification.
 

Class Summary
Action Class Action is the superclass of each state predicate.
ActionWellPerformed A notification that an attempt to carry out an Action was performed in the right way.
ActionWrongPerformed A notification that an attempt to carry out an Action was performed in the wrong way.
Check A check whether an Action was really performed.
DummyChecker Dummy implementation of the interface Checker, which is unable to handle any notification type.
FilteredPolicy Represents a filtered policy.
Goal Represents a goal.
Notification A notification that an attempt to carry out an Action was performed.
NotificationReliable A confirmation that what is asserted in a Notification is reliable.
NotificationUnreliable A confirmation that what is asserted in a Notification is not reliable.
ProtuneMessage A OngoingNegotiationMessage particularly suited for the Protune environment: each ProtuneMessage contains a set of FilteredPolicy and a set of Notification.
ProtuneService The class ProtuneService could be described as the most important class of the Protune system, indeed it implements the algorithm the whole negotiation bases on.
 

Exception Summary
UnknownNotificationException The exception UnknownNotificationException is meant to be thrown by one of the methods of (one of the implementations of) the interface Checker when the checker is unable to handle some notification type.
 

Package org.protune.core Description

Package org.protune.core provides the core classes of the Protune system. Class ProtuneService is a good starting point for the exploration of this package, since almost all other classes of org.protune.core are required in order to construct an ProtuneService object.
